snippet: The group’s president, Cornell William Brooks, said the meeting with the attorney general addressed voter suppression, police misconduct and civil rights....

headline.main: All 36 Victims of Ghost Ship Fire Died From Smoke Inhalation
headline.print_headline: All 36 Victims of Ghost Ship Fire Died From Smoke Inhalation

lead_paragraph: The group’s president, Cornell William Brooks, said the meeting with the attorney general addressed voter suppression, police misconduct and civil rights.
